content.body:
The deadline for registering for the March Plenary meeting in New York is 24th Feb.  So far we have 19 sign-ups!  Please register here if you have not done so already.

- [**In-person registrations for March TC30 Plenary**](https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/573#issuecomment-3847754536)
